name: Premium Chicken & Rice Dog Food (5kg)
description: A gourmet, protein-rich blend crafted to fuel your dog’s daily adventures while supporting lean muscle maintenance and digestive harmony.
ingredients: Deboned Chicken, Brown Rice, Oatmeal, Chicken Fat, Flaxseed, Natural Flavor, Vitamins (E, A, D3, B12), Minerals (Zinc, Iron, Copper), Omega-3 & Omega-6 Fatty Acids
healthBenefits: High-quality protein supports strong muscles. Omega fatty acids promote healthy skin and shiny coat. Antioxidants boost immune system.
targetAudience: Adult dogs (1-7 years), All breeds, All sizes
specialFeatures: No artificial colors, flavors, or preservatives. Made with real deboned chicken.
usageInstructions: Feed according to weight. Small dogs (5-10kg): 1-1.5 cups daily. Divide into 2 meals.

name: Puppy Growth Formula (3kg)
description: Nutrient-dense kibble enriched with DHA to spark brain development and build a sturdy foundation for your puppy’s lifelong health.
ingredients: Chicken Meal, Salmon Meal, Brown Rice, Sweet Potato, Fish Oil (DHA source), Probiotics, Calcium, Phosphorus
healthBenefits: DHA supports brain and vision development. Optimal calcium-phosphorus ratio promotes strong bones.
targetAudience: Puppies up to 12 months old, All breeds
specialFeatures: Small kibble size perfect for puppy mouths. Enhanced with DHA from fish oil.
usageInstructions: Feed 3-4 times daily for puppies under 6 months. Transition gradually over 7-10 days.

name: Senior Dog Nutrition (4kg)
description: A gentle, restorative formula designed to revitalize aging companions, featuring specialized joint support and easy-to-digest antioxidants.
ingredients: Chicken, Rice, Glucosamine, Chondroitin, Fiber Blend, Omega Fatty Acids, Vitamin E, Selenium
healthBenefits: Glucosamine supports joint mobility. Reduced calories maintain ideal weight for less active dogs.
targetAudience: Senior dogs 7+ years old, All breeds
specialFeatures: Smaller kibble size easier to chew. Heart-healthy lower sodium content.
usageInstructions: Feed 2 times daily. For dogs with dental issues, can be moistened with warm water.

name: Dental Chew Bones (Pack of 10)
description: Dual-action treats that scrub away plaque and neutralize 'doggy breath,' turning essential oral hygiene into a delicious daily ritual.
ingredients: Rawhide, Natural Chicken Flavor, Parsley, Mint Extract, Calcium
healthBenefits: Reduces plaque and tartar buildup. Freshens breath naturally. Satisfies natural chewing instinct.
targetAudience: Adult dogs, Medium to large breeds
specialFeatures: Long-lasting chew. Natural ingredients. Mint and parsley for fresh breath.
usageInstructions: Give 1 chew bone daily. Supervise your dog while chewing. Not suitable for puppies under 6 months.

name: Interactive Puzzle Toy
description: An engaging mental workout that challenges your dog’s problem-solving skills to curb boredom and prevent destructive behaviors.
ingredients: Durable Non-Toxic Rubber, BPA-Free Plastic
healthBenefits: Provides mental stimulation and prevents boredom. Reduces anxiety and destructive behavior.
targetAudience: All adult dogs, Especially smart breeds
specialFeatures: Adjustable difficulty levels. Dishwasher safe. Can hold treats or kibble.
usageInstructions: Fill with treats or kibble. Start with easy level. Clean regularly with warm soapy water.

name: Rope Tug Toy
description: A rugged, multi-textured rope built for high-energy play, doubling as a natural flosser to clean teeth during every game of tug-of-war.
ingredients: 100% Natural Cotton Rope, Non-Toxic Dyes
healthBenefits: Helps clean teeth while playing. Strengthens bond through interactive play.
targetAudience: Medium to large dogs, Active dogs
specialFeatures: Durable cotton rope. Machine washable. Multiple grip points.
usageInstructions: Use for interactive tug-of-war. Replace when rope becomes frayed. Supervise play.

name: TropiClean Oatmeal Shampoo
description: A spa-quality, soap-free wash that instantly calms irritated skin and leaves your pet’s coat smelling tropical and feeling silky.
ingredients: Oatmeal, Aloe Vera, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E, Natural Extracts, pH Balanced Formula
healthBenefits: Soothes dry and itchy skin. Moisturizes coat and skin. Hypoallergenic formula.
targetAudience: Dogs with sensitive skin, All breeds
specialFeatures: Soap-free formula. pH balanced for dogs. Natural ingredients.
usageInstructions: Wet coat thoroughly. Massage into coat. Leave on for 3-5 minutes. Rinse completely.

name: Adjustable Nylon Collar
description: A blend of safety and style, featuring high-visibility reflective stitching and a secure, quick-release buckle for everyday peace of mind.
ingredients: Heavy-Duty Nylon Webbing, Reflective Thread, Quick-Release Buckle, Stainless Steel D-Ring
healthBenefits: Comfortable fit prevents neck strain. Reflective stitching ensures visibility at night.
targetAudience: All dogs, Adjustable for neck sizes 30-50cm
specialFeatures: Reflective stitching for night safety. Quick-release buckle. Durable D-ring.
usageInstructions: Adjust to fit snugly - should fit two fingers between collar and neck. Check fit regularly.

name: Retractable Leash (5m)
description: Give your dog the freedom to explore with a tangle-free, heavy-duty cord and an intuitive one-touch braking system for total control.
ingredients: Nylon Cord, ABS Plastic Housing, Ergonomic Rubber Grip
healthBenefits: Allows natural movement and exploration. Provides exercise freedom while maintaining safety.
specialFeatures: One-button brake and lock system. 5-meter retractable cord. Ergonomic grip.
usageInstructions: Attach to collar or harness. Press button to lock at desired length. Use brake for quick stops.

name: Training Treats (500g)
description: Succulent, bite-sized rewards designed to keep your dog focused and motivated without over-calculating their daily calorie intake.
ingredients: Chicken, Sweet Potato, Peas, Glycerin, Natural Flavors, Vitamins
healthBenefits: Low calorie for frequent rewards. Soft texture easy to chew quickly.
targetAudience: All dogs, Especially for training, Puppies and adults
specialFeatures: Small bite-sized pieces. Low calorie (3 calories per treat). Resealable bag.
usageInstructions: Use as rewards during training. Give 5-10 treats per session. Store in cool, dry place.

name: Ocean Catch Wet Food (12 Pack)
description: A moisture-rich feast of flaky tuna and salmon that mimics a cat’s natural diet while promoting optimal kidney and urinary health.
ingredients: Whole Tuna, Salmon, Water Sufficient for Processing, Taurine, Vitamin E Supplement
healthBenefits: High moisture content supports urinary tract health. Taurine supports heart and eye health.
specialFeatures: Real fish pieces. No artificial thickeners. Rich in Omega-3.
usageInstructions: Feed 1 can per 1.5kg of body weight daily. Serve at room temperature. Refrigerate leftovers.

name: Grain-Free Salmon Formula (3kg)
description: High-performance, hypoallergenic nutrition that prioritizes real fish over fillers to give your cat a radiant coat and boundless energy.
ingredients: Deboned Salmon, Chicken Meal, Peas, Lentils, Tapioca Starch, Cranberries, Blueberries
healthBenefits: Grain-free for sensitive stomachs. Cranberries support urinary health. Blueberries provide antioxidants.
targetAudience: Adult cats, Cats with grain sensitivities
specialFeatures: Grain-free. High protein content. Holistic ingredients.
usageInstructions: Feed 1/2 to 3/4 cup daily for average cats. Adjust based on activity levels. Always provide water.

name: Kitten Growth Formula (2kg)
description: A velvety, protein-packed start for your little hunter, balanced with essential minerals for rapid bone growth and immune defense.
ingredients: Chicken Meal, Dried Egg Product, Fish Oil, Brewers Rice, Beet Pulp, Potassium Chloride
healthBenefits: High protein for rapid growth. DHA from fish oil for brain development. Small kibble for tiny mouths.
targetAudience: Kittens up to 12 months, Pregnant or nursing cats
specialFeatures: Nutrient-dense. Easy to digest. Natural DHA sources.
usageInstructions: Kittens (under 4 months): 1/2-1 cup. (4-12 months): 1/2-3/4 cup. Feed multiple times daily.

name: Catnip Toy Mouse
description: An irresistible, aromatic plush toy that triggers natural hunting instincts, providing hours of pouncing, batting, and active exercise.
ingredients: Plush Fabric, Organic North American Catnip, Polyester Filling
healthBenefits: Encourages natural hunting instincts. Reduces stress through play and catnip exposure.
specialFeatures: Refillable catnip pouch. Double-stitched for durability. Realistic mouse shape.
usageInstructions: Toss to cat to initiate play. Store in a sealed container when not in use to keep catnip fresh.

name: Feather Wand Interactive Toy
description: Strengthen the bond with your feline friend using this aerodynamic wand that mimics the unpredictable flight of prey.
ingredients: Carbon Fiber Wand, Natural Bird Feathers, Braided Wire, Foam Grip
healthBenefits: Improves agility and speed. Provides essential cardiovascular exercise for indoor cats.
specialFeatures: Telescopic wand. Realistic feather movement. Safe, break-away wire.
usageInstructions: Sweep wand through the air or across the floor. Do not allow cat to chew or swallow feathers.

name: Laser Pointer Toy
description: An automated, erratic light show that provides a high-intensity cardio workout for even the most sedentary indoor cats.
ingredients: ABS Plastic, Class II Laser, Electronic Components
healthBenefits: Provides high-intensity exercise. Mentally stimulates through erratic movement.
specialFeatures: 360-degree rotation. Automatic timer (15 min). Adjustable speed settings.
usageInstructions: Place on a flat surface or hold by hand. Never shine directly into eyes. End session with a physical toy.

name: Clumping Litter 10L
description: Superior odor-trapping clay that forms rock-solid clumps instantly, making litter box maintenance effortless and keeping your home fresh.
ingredients: Natural Sodium Bentonite Clay, Activated Charcoal, Fragrance Micro-capsules
healthBenefits: 99% dust-free to protect respiratory health. Prevents bacterial growth through quick clumping.
specialFeatures: Instant-clump technology. 10-day odor protection. Soft on paws.
usageInstructions: Fill box to 3-4 inches. Scoop daily. Replace entire box monthly. Do not flush.

name: Breakaway Safety Collar
description: A feather-light, stylish collar engineered to release instantly if snagged, ensuring your cat’s safety during climbs and leaps.
ingredients: Nylon Webbing, Plastic Breakaway Buckle, Steel Bell
healthBenefits: Safety buckle releases if snagged, preventing strangulation. Bell warns local wildlife.
specialFeatures: Reflective striping. High-decibel bell. Breakaway safety clasp.
usageInstructions: Adjust so two fingers fit underneath. Check weekly for wear or size changes.

name: Scratching Post Tower
description: A vertical playground of durable sisal and plush tiers that satisfies the urge to scratch while protecting your valuable furniture.
ingredients: Natural Sisal Rope, Faux Fur, Engineered Wood, Particle Board
healthBenefits: Maintains claw health through shedding of outer sheaths. Provides a safe outlet for marking behavior.
targetAudience: All cats, Especially those prone to scratching furniture
specialFeatures: Weighted base for stability. Built-in hanging toy. Durable sisal wrap.
usageInstructions: Place in an area where your cat spends time. Encourage use with catnip spray.

name: Salmon Flavor Treats (200g)
description: Crunchy, savory bites that help reduce tartar buildup, offering a rewarding 'crunch' that cats find absolutely addictive.
ingredients: Salmon, Chicken Meal, Animal Fat, Corn Gluten Meal, Natural Flavors
healthBenefits: Tartar control through crunchy texture. High protein boost between meals.
specialFeatures: Under 2 calories per treat. Resealable stay-fresh pouch. No artificial flavors.
usageInstructions: Give up to 10 treats per day. Not intended as a meal replacement. Provide water.

name: Parrot Seed Mix 2kg
description: A diverse, orchard-inspired blend of premium seeds and sun-dried fruits that encourages natural foraging and vibrant plumage.
ingredients: Striped Sunflower Seeds, Safflower, Whole Corn, Dried Papaya, Dried Pineapple, Peanuts
healthBenefits: Vitamin A for feather color. High energy for flight and play. Fiber for digestion.
specialFeatures: Dust-cleaned seeds. Natural fruit pieces. No synthetic dyes.
usageInstructions: Fill seed cup daily. Remove hulls. Supplement with fresh greens and fruits.

name: Canary Food Mix (1kg)
description: A delicate, vitamin-fortified seed selection specifically balanced to fuel the high metabolism and beautiful melodies of songbirds.
ingredients: Canary Grass Seed, Rape Seed, Flax Seed, Hemp Seed, Nyjer Seed, Vitamin Granules
healthBenefits: Supports song production. Enhances yellow and red feather pigments. High protein for molting.
specialFeatures: Small seed variety. Fortified with vitamins. Triple-cleaned for purity.
usageInstructions: Provide 1-2 teaspoons daily per bird. Ensure daily water change.

name: Budgie Pellets (500g)
description: Science-based, uniform nutrition that eliminates selective eating, ensuring your bird receives 100% of the vitamins required for longevity.
ingredients: Ground Corn, Soybean Meal, Wheat Germ, Vegetable Oil, Calcium Carbonate
healthBenefits: Prevents selective eating habits. Consistent vitamin intake. Reduces waste.
specialFeatures: Nutritionally complete. Uniform shape and size. Fruity aroma.
usageInstructions: Transition from seeds slowly. Pellets should be 60-70% of total diet.

name: Bird Swing
description: A rustic, birchwood perch that provides vital exercise for balance and a cozy, elevated spot for your bird to survey its kingdom.
ingredients: Kiln-dried Birch Wood, Non-Toxic Glue, Steel Hanging Hook
healthBenefits: Improves balance and coordination. Provides a sense of security while sleeping.
specialFeatures: Natural texture for grip. Sturdy construction. Easy-clip attachment.
usageInstructions: Hang in the upper center of the cage. Check for splinters over time.

name: Mirror with Bell Toy
description: A stimulating social accessory that provides companionship and musical entertainment to brighten your bird’s daily environment.
ingredients: Safety Glass Mirror, BPA-free Plastic Frame, Metal Bell
healthBenefits: Reduces loneliness for single birds. Stimulates social behavior and vocalization.
specialFeatures: Unbreakable safety glass. Bright colors. Audible bell.
usageInstructions: Attach to the side of the cage near a perch. Clean mirror with water only.

name: Rope Perch
description: A flexible, cotton-soft habitat addition that prevents foot fatigue by offering varying grip diameters and customizable climbing paths.
ingredients: Cotton Rope, Internal Bending Wire, Plastic End Caps
healthBenefits: Varying diameter prevents foot sores (bumblefoot). Exercises leg and foot muscles.
specialFeatures: Bends to any shape. Soft on feet. Washable cotton.
usageInstructions: Twist onto cage bars. Change the shape weekly to provide new challenges.

name: Cuttlebone Pack (3 pieces)
description: An essential marine mineral source that naturally files down growing beaks while providing a vital boost of bioavailable calcium.
ingredients: Natural Cuttlefish Bone
healthBenefits: Natural source of calcium and minerals. Keeps beaks trimmed and sharp.
specialFeatures: 100% natural. Includes metal holder. Harvested from the sea.
usageInstructions: Attach to cage with soft side facing the bird. Replace once mostly consumed.

name: Bird Bath Bowl
description: A secure, splash-proof oasis that encourages natural preening behaviors and keeps feathers pristine and dust-free.
ingredients: Food-grade Plastic, Stainless Steel Screws
healthBenefits: Helps remove dust and dander from feathers. Essential for skin hydration and preening.
targetAudience: Small birds like Budgies and Canaries
specialFeatures: Anti-slip floor. Universal cage hooks. Transparent cover.
usageInstructions: Fill with lukewarm water. Offer 2-3 times per week. Remove after 1 hour.

name: Cage Cover (Large)
description: A blackout, breathable sanctuary wrap that helps regulate your bird’s circadian rhythm for deep, restorative sleep.
ingredients: Light-blocking Polyester, Breathable Mesh Panels
healthBenefits: Reduces night frights. Ensures 10-12 hours of uninterrupted sleep for mental health.
specialFeatures: Velcro closures. Machine washable. Non-toxic fabric.
usageInstructions: Drape over cage at sunset. Ensure mesh panels are aligned with vents.

name: Honey Sticks (Pack of 5)
description: A gourmet 'foraging treat' baked with golden honey to provide a natural energy burst during molting or breeding seasons.
ingredients: Millet, Honey, Egg Product, Niger Seed, Wheat Flour
healthBenefits: Provides foraging activity. High energy for breeding or molting seasons.
specialFeatures: Triple-baked for crunch. Natural wood center. Easy hang clip.
usageInstructions: Hang from cage roof. Limit to one stick per week to prevent obesity.

name: Tropical Flake Food 250g
description: A precision-balanced, color-enhancing formula that stays afloat longer to ensure all community fish receive optimal nutrition.
ingredients: Fish Meal, Dried Yeast, Ground Brown Rice, Shrimp Meal, Algae Meal
healthBenefits: Natural pigments enhance fish color. Vitamin C supports immune system.
specialFeatures: Clean water formula. High protein. Float-then-sink design.
usageInstructions: Feed 2-3 times daily. Only as much as fish can consume in 3 minutes.

name: Goldfish Pellets (500g)
description: Expertly crafted, fiber-rich pellets that support the unique digestive needs of goldfish while preventing water cloudiness.
ingredients: Wheat Germ Meal, White Fish Meal, Spirulina, Garlic, Probiotics
healthBenefits: Low protein/high fiber for goldfish digestion. Spirulina for vibrant scales.
specialFeatures: Sinking/Floating options. Non-clouding. Rich in antioxidants.
usageInstructions: Feed once daily. Avoid overfeeding as goldfish have no stomachs.

name: Betta Fish Food (100g)
description: Nutrient-dense micro-pellets formulated with high-quality proteins to enhance the majestic finnage and bold colors of Betta fish.
ingredients: Brine Shrimp Meal, Bloodworms, Krill, Vitamin B12, Calcium
healthBenefits: High protein supports fin growth and repair. Enhances natural aggression and alertness.
specialFeatures: Micro-pellet size. Highly palatable. Contains garlic to entice eaters.
usageInstructions: Feed 2-3 pellets twice daily. Remove uneaten food immediately.

name: Decorative Aquarium Plant Pack
description: Life-like, silk-textured greenery that creates a lush underwater landscape and vital hiding zones without any maintenance.
ingredients: Non-toxic Silk/Plastic, Ceramic weighted base
healthBenefits: Provides hiding spots to reduce stress. Breaks lines of sight for aggressive species.
specialFeatures: Vibrant colors. Safe for fins. No maintenance required.
usageInstructions: Rinse in warm water before placement. Bury bases in substrate.

name: Aquarium Castle Decoration
description: A majestic, non-toxic centerpiece that provides essential swim-through architecture and territory for shy or nocturnal species.
ingredients: Polyresin, Non-toxic Paint
healthBenefits: Territory marking. Shelter for nocturnal fish and fry (baby fish).
specialFeatures: Swim-through holes. Hand-painted detail. pH neutral.
usageInstructions: Clean monthly with a soft brush during water changes.

name: Floating Log Decoration
description: A realistic, buoyant retreat that offers surface-dwelling fish a secure place to rest and feed, mimicking natural river debris.
ingredients: Resin, Air-pockets for buoyancy
healthBenefits: Encourages surface interaction. Provides a resting spot for Betta fish.
specialFeatures: Realistic wood texture. Floats indefinitely. Top-feeding hole.
usageInstructions: Place on the surface. Ensure it doesn't block the filter intake.

name: Aquarium Water Conditioner 500ml
description: A professional-grade formula that instantly neutralizes harsh tap water chemicals and bolsters the protective slime coat of your fish.
ingredients: Sodium Thiosulfate, EDTA, Aloe Vera extract
healthBenefits: Prevents gill burn from chlorine. Aloe vera promotes slime coat recovery.
specialFeatures: Instant action. Concentrated formula. Safe for invertebrates.
usageInstructions: Add 5ml per 40L of new tap water during water changes.

name: Aquarium Filter (Small)
description: A whisper-quiet, three-stage filtration system that maintains crystal-clear water and a healthy biological balance in smaller setups.
ingredients: ABS Plastic Housing, Sponge Media, Carbon Cartridge
healthBenefits: Removes ammonia and nitrites. Aerates water for oxygenation.
specialFeatures: Adjustable flow rate. Silent motor. 3-stage filtration.
usageInstructions: Submerge fully. Rinse sponge in old tank water only to preserve bacteria.

name: LED Aquarium Light
description: Energy-efficient lighting that brings out the hidden shimmer of your fish and supports the photosynthesis of live aquatic plants.
ingredients: Aluminum Alloy Heat Sink, SMD LED Chips, Acrylic Lens
healthBenefits: Simulates natural day/night cycles. Promotes healthy live plant growth.
specialFeatures: Moonlight mode. Touch control. Slim profile.
usageInstructions: Mount on cage rim. Use for 8-10 hours daily to prevent algae.

name: Freeze-Dried Bloodworms
description: A pure, protein-dense delicacy that provides a natural 'live-prey' taste without the risk of introducing aquarium parasites.
ingredients: 100% Freeze-dried Bloodworms
healthBenefits: Pure protein for growth and vitality. No parasites (common in live food).
specialFeatures: Freshness locked. Floating treats. Resealable tin.
usageInstructions: Offer twice weekly as a supplement. Soak in water before feeding to prevent bloat.

name: Reptile Pellets (1kg)
description: A nutritionally complete, alfalfa-based diet fortified with Vitamin D3 to ensure strong skeletal health and vitality.
ingredients: Alfalfa Meal, Soy Hulls, Rice Bran, Vitamin D3, Calcium Phosphate
healthBenefits: Vitamin D3 for calcium absorption. Prevents metabolic bone disease (MBD).
specialFeatures: High fiber. Color-enhanced. Long shelf life.
usageInstructions: Moisten with water or fruit juice before feeding to young reptiles.

name: Dried Crickets (200g)
description: A convenient, 'gut-loaded' protein source that provides the essential amino acids reptiles need for growth and energy.
ingredients: Whole Dried Crickets
healthBenefits: Excellent source of amino acids. Provides variety in the diet.
specialFeatures: Gut-loaded before drying. No preservatives. High palatability.
usageInstructions: Feed as a primary source or supplement. Dust with calcium powder.

name: Mealworms (500g)
description: A high-calorie, energy-rich supplement perfect for growing juveniles or reptiles needing a boost in their daily fat intake.
ingredients: Farm-raised Mealworms (Dried)
healthBenefits: High fat content for weight gain in recovering animals. High protein.
specialFeatures: Vacuum sealed. Easy to store. Clean and odorless.
usageInstructions: Feed in a shallow dish to prevent escapes into substrate.

name: Climbing Branch
description: A sandblasted, natural grapevine that adds vertical dimension to your terrarium while assisting with healthy skin shedding.
ingredients: Sandblasted Grapevine or Driftwood
healthBenefits: Encourages natural climbing behavior. Helps in shedding by providing friction.
specialFeatures: Unique shapes. Mold resistant. Chemically untreated.
usageInstructions: Secure firmly to the enclosure walls to prevent falls.

name: Rock Cave Hideout
description: A rugged, non-porous sanctuary that offers a cool, dark retreat for reptiles to thermoregulate and feel completely secure.
ingredients: High-density Resin
healthBenefits: Reduces stress by providing a secure hiding area. Helps regulate body temperature.
specialFeatures: Non-porous surface. Weighted to prevent tipping. Easy to disinfect.
usageInstructions: Place on the cool side of the enclosure. Wash weekly.

name: Hammock for Reptiles
description: A sturdy, elevated lounging mesh that utilizes the 'warm zone' of the enclosure, providing a unique basking experience.
ingredients: Nylon Mesh, Suction Cups
healthBenefits: Utilizes vertical space. Provides a unique basking spot closer to heat lamps.
specialFeatures: Breathable mesh. Strong suction. Machine washable.
usageInstructions: Attach to glass corners. Ensure it's not too close to high-wattage bulbs.

name: Heat Lamp (50W)
description: A focused, UVA-emitting thermal source that simulates natural sunlight to kickstart your reptile's metabolism and digestion.
ingredients: Neodymium Glass, Tungsten Filament
healthBenefits: Essential for digestion and metabolism in cold-blooded animals.
specialFeatures: UVA emitting. Focused beam. 2000-hour life.
usageInstructions: Use with a ceramic socket. Keep away from water and flammable materials.

name: Reptile Substrate 10L
description: Eco-friendly, moisture-retaining coconut husk that creates a soft, natural floor for burrowing and maintaining humidity.
ingredients: Coconut Husk Fiber (Coir)
healthBenefits: Maintains humidity levels. Soft on reptile bellies and toes.
specialFeatures: Eco-friendly. Expandable. Naturally mold resistant.
usageInstructions: Soak in water to expand. Replace every 2-3 months.

name: Thermometer & Hygrometer
description: A high-precision digital monitor that ensures your pet's environment stays within the critical 'Goldilocks zone' for health.
ingredients: ABS Plastic, Digital Sensor Probes
healthBenefits: Ensures the environment stays within safe physiological limits.
specialFeatures: Min/Max memory. Duel probes. Large LCD.
usageInstructions: Place probes at both ends of the tank to monitor the thermal gradient.

name: Calcium Supplement
description: An ultra-fine, phosphorus-free powder designed to coat feeders easily, preventing metabolic bone disease in all life stages.
ingredients: Calcium Carbonate, Vitamin D3
healthBenefits: Critical for preventing metabolic bone disease. Supports egg production.
specialFeatures: Ultrafine powder. Phosphorus-free. High absorption.
usageInstructions: Lightly dust insects or greens before feeding.

name: Seed Mix 1kg
description: A harvest-themed variety of grains and nuts that encourages the natural 'pouching' and hoarding instincts of curious hamsters.
ingredients: Sunflowers, Peanuts, Wheat, Millet, Corn, Dried Peas
healthBenefits: Provides energy for exercise. Encourages foraging and pouching behavior.
specialFeatures: Diverse textures. All-natural. High fiber.
usageInstructions: Feed 1-2 tablespoons daily. Scatter feed to encourage natural behavior.

name: Hamster Pellets (500g)
description: A compact, vitamin-aligned diet that prevents selective feeding, ensuring your pet gets every bit of nutrition in every bite.
ingredients: Timothy Hay, Ground Corn, Soybean Meal, Vitamin Supplements
healthBenefits: Ensures full vitamin intake. Keeps teeth trimmed through grinding.
specialFeatures: Uniform nutrition. Low fat. No artificial colors.
usageInstructions: Can be mixed with seeds or fed alone as the main diet.

name: Dried Vegetables Mix (200g)
description: A colorful, crunchy blend of garden favorites that provides essential antioxidants and fiber for a healthy digestive tract.
ingredients: Dried Carrots, Zucchini, Broccoli, Sweet Potato
healthBenefits: Rich in Beta-carotene and Vitamin C. Low sugar content compared to fruit.
specialFeatures: Freeze-dried for nutrients. No added sulfur.
usageInstructions: Add a small pinch to daily food for variety.

name: Hamster Wheel Silent
description: An engineered, friction-free wheel that allows for miles of midnight running without making a sound in your bedroom.
ingredients: BPA-free Plastic, Dual Ball Bearings
healthBenefits: Prevents obesity. Essential for mental health and reducing stress.
specialFeatures: Solid surface (no wire gaps). Whisper quiet. Stand or cage mount.
usageInstructions: Ensure wheel is large enough (8-12 inches) so hamster's back doesn't arch.

name: Wooden Hideout
description: A charming, bark-covered cottage made of safe, gnawable wood that doubles as a cozy bedroom and a dental chew.
ingredients: Natural Pine Wood, Non-toxic Glue
healthBenefits: Provides a safe sleeping spot. Safe for gnawing to maintain teeth.
specialFeatures: Bark-covered. Multi-room design. Bark aids in tooth filing.
usageInstructions: Place in a corner. Clean with a damp cloth; do not soak.

name: Tunnel System (3 pieces)
description: A modular, transparent playground that mimics natural underground burrows, providing endless exploration and exercise.
ingredients: Washable Plastic
healthBenefits: Simulates natural burrowing environments. Increases habitat square footage.
specialFeatures: Air vents. Compatible with most modular cages. Transparent for viewing.
usageInstructions: Connect to cage ports. Disassemble weekly for deep cleaning.

name: Water Bottle (250ml)
description: A drip-proof, stainless-steel tipped bottle that ensures a constant supply of clean, debris-free water for your small pet.
ingredients: Plastic Bottle, Stainless Steel Sipper Tube
healthBenefits: Keeps drinking water clean from bedding and food. Prevents dehydration.
specialFeatures: Drip-resistant valve. Wire hanger included. BPA-free.
usageInstructions: Fill completely to create vacuum. Check the ball for movement daily.

name: Food Bowl Ceramic
description: A heavyweight, chew-proof dish that stays exactly where you put it, preventing spills and cage messes.
ingredients: Kiln-fired Ceramic
healthBenefits: Hygienic and easy to clean. Prevents hamsters from flipping their food.
specialFeatures: Gnaw-proof. Heavyweight base. Smooth glaze.
usageInstructions: Place on a level surface. Wash with mild soap daily.

name: Bedding Material (1kg)
description: A cloud-soft, ultra-absorbent paper bedding that neutralizes ammonia odors and provides the perfect material for nesting.
ingredients: Unbleached Paper Pulp
healthBenefits: Excellent ammonia control. Soft texture allows for complex burrowing.
specialFeatures: 99% dust free. Expands to 3x volume. Biodegradable.
usageInstructions: Spread 3-6 inches deep in the habitat. Spot clean daily.

name: Yogurt Drops (100g)
description: Sweet, calcium-fortified treats that serve as the perfect tool for taming and bonding with your small furry friend.
ingredients: Dried Whey, Palm Oil, Sugar, Lecithin, Yogurt Powder
healthBenefits: Small dose of calcium. High palatability for taming and bonding.
specialFeatures: Bite-sized. Creamy texture. Resealable bag.
usageInstructions: Give only 1-2 per week due to high sugar content.

name: Timothy Hay 5kg
description: Sun-cured, long-strand fiber that is the cornerstone of rabbit health, essential for digestive movement and dental wear.
ingredients: 100% Sun-cured Timothy Hay
healthBenefits: 80% of a rabbit's diet. Prevents GI stasis and grinds down teeth.
specialFeatures: Long strand fiber. Hand-selected. Low protein and calcium.
usageInstructions: Provide unlimited amounts. Hay should always be available.

name: Rabbit Pellets 2kg
description: A nutrient-dense, alfalfa-based pellet designed to support the high energy needs of young or growing bunnies.
ingredients: Alfalfa Meal, Wheat Middlings, Soybean Meal, Cane Molasses
healthBenefits: Concentrated vitamins and minerals. Supports energy levels in active bunnies.
targetAudience: Young rabbits (under 6 months) or nursing moms
specialFeatures: High calcium for bone growth. No corn or seeds.
usageInstructions: Limit to 1/4 cup per 2kg of body weight daily.

name: Mixed Vegetables (1kg)
description: A garden-fresh medley of dried treats that adds variety and excitement to your rabbit’s daily foraging routine.
ingredients: Flaked Corn, Dried Peas, Flaked Carrots, Rosehips
healthBenefits: Vitamin boost. Rosehips are high in Vitamin C. Variety prevents boredom.
specialFeatures: Natural ingredients. No artificial coloring. Crunch aids tooth health.
usageInstructions: Sprinkle over hay to encourage foraging.

name: Chew Toy Set (5 pieces)
description: A curated collection of natural willow and applewood textures that satisfies the instinctual urge to gnaw and protects your home.
ingredients: Willow, Applewood, Loofah, Rattan
healthBenefits: Prevents overgrowth of incisors. Reduces destructive chewing of furniture.
specialFeatures: 100% natural materials. Pesticide-free. Variety of textures.
usageInstructions: Place throughout the play area. Discard when small enough to be swallowed.

name: Tunnel Hideout
description: A collapsible, crinkle-textured tunnel that provides a high-speed 'zoomie' track and a secure place to nap.
ingredients: Polyester Fabric, Internal Steel Sprung Frame
healthBenefits: Provides a 'safe zone' for shy rabbits. Encourages exercise and running (zoomies).
specialFeatures: Peephole on top. Crinkle sound inside. Folds flat for storage.
usageInstructions: Do not leave with rabbits prone to eating fabric. Hand wash only.

name: Ball with Bell
description: An interactive, rolling toy that encourages your rabbit to nudge, toss, and play, stimulating both mind and body.
ingredients: Plastic Shell, Internal Metal Bell
healthBenefits: Promotes physical activity through tossing and pushing behavior.
specialFeatures: Hard plastic resists gnawing. Brightly colored. Stimulating sound.
usageInstructions: Encourage the rabbit to nose the ball for a sound reward.

name: Grooming Brush
description: A soft-touch brush designed to gently remove loose fur, preventing dangerous hairballs and keeping the coat velveteen.
ingredients: Synthetic Soft Bristles, Rubber Handle
healthBenefits: Prevents hairballs (rabbits cannot vomit). Massages skin to improve circulation.
specialFeatures: Ergonomic grip. Gentle on sensitive skin. Easy to clean.
usageInstructions: Brush in the direction of hair growth. Use daily during molting seasons.

name: Litter Box with Grate
description: A smart, space-saving corner box that keeps paws dry and simplifies the process of house-training your rabbit.
ingredients: Polished Plastic, Removable Wire Grate
healthBenefits: Keeps paws clean from waste. Encourages litter training and hygiene.
specialFeatures: High back to prevent sprays. Wire floor keeps rabbit dry.
usageInstructions: Place in the corner where the rabbit naturally goes. Fill with paper-based litter.

name: Hay Feeder Rack
description: A tidy, wall-mounted solution that keeps essential hay off the floor, ensuring it stays clean, dry, and appetizing.
ingredients: Powder-coated Metal Wire
healthBenefits: Prevents hay from being soiled by urine or droppings. Encourages upright eating posture.
specialFeatures: Easy to refill. Attaches to any wire cage. Durable construction.
usageInstructions: Mount above the litter box as rabbits like to eat while they go.

name: Carrot Chips (200g)
description: 100% natural, dehydrated carrot slices that offer a healthy, vitamin-A-rich crunch for special bonding moments.
ingredients: 100% Dried Carrots
healthBenefits: Vitamin A and Beta-carotene. High crunch factor for dental health.
specialFeatures: No added sugar or oil. Real carrot slices. Hand-packed.
usageInstructions: Give 1-2 chips daily. Carrots are high in natural sugar, so use sparingly.

name: Aquatic Turtle Pellets (500g)
description: A floating, protein-forward diet designed to support a hard, healthy shell and vigorous swimming activity.
ingredients: Fish Meal, Soybean Meal, Wheat Flour, Yeast, Vitamin C, Calcium
healthBenefits: High protein for shell development. Floating pellets mimic natural surface feeding.
specialFeatures: Stays afloat. Doesn't cloud water. Fortified with vitamins.
usageInstructions: Feed as much as they can eat in 5 minutes. Remove leftovers.

name: Dried Shrimp (200g)
description: A savory, calcium-rich treat that mimics the natural aquatic prey of turtles, perfect for a high-energy protein boost.
ingredients: 100% Whole Dried Gammarus Shrimp
healthBenefits: Natural source of chitin for shell strength. High protein boost.
specialFeatures: Natural smell and taste. Sun-dried. Rich in calcium.
usageInstructions: Use as a treat or primary source 3 times per week.

name: Turtle Sticks (300g)
description: A balanced, fiber-rich formula that incorporates essential plant matter for the long-term health of semi-aquatic species.
ingredients: Corn Meal, Fish Meal, Calcium Carbonate, Kale Powder
healthBenefits: High fiber for digestion. Balanced calcium-phosphorus ratio.
specialFeatures: Easy to grab. Low waste. Includes plant matter.
usageInstructions: Provide in a feeding dish on land or float in water.

name: Basking Platform
description: A textured, easy-climb ramp that allows turtles to fully exit the water and absorb life-sustaining UV rays.
ingredients: BPA-free Plastic, Suction Cups
healthBenefits: Allows turtle to dry shell completely, preventing rot. Essential for thermoregulation.
specialFeatures: Textured ramp for grip. Adjustable height. Floating design.
usageInstructions: Place under the UVB/Heat lamp. Ensure it's stable for the turtle's weight.

name: Floating Dock
description: A self-leveling, rock-textured island that adjusts to your tank's water level, providing a consistent spot for sunning.
ingredients: Non-toxic Polyurethane Foam
healthBenefits: Self-levels with water changes. Provides a larger surface for multiple turtles.
specialFeatures: Realistic stone look. Submerged ramp. No sharp edges.
usageInstructions: Secure to the glass wall with suction cups. Wash during tank cleaning.

name: Aquarium Decoration Rock
description: A heavy, resin-molded formation that creates an underwater cave system for resting and exploration.
ingredients: Eco-friendly Resin
healthBenefits: Provides underwater shelter. Reduces stress in community tanks.
specialFeatures: Flat top for resting. Safe for water chemistry. Realistic moss detail.
usageInstructions: Rinse before use. Place on the bottom before adding water.

name: Shell Cleaner (250ml)
description: A gentle, aloe-infused solution that conditions the scutes and safely removes unsightly algae or mineral buildup.
ingredients: Water, Gentle Surfactants, Aloe Vera, Vitamin E
healthBenefits: Removes algae and mineral deposits. Conditions the shell to prevent cracking.
specialFeatures: Fragrance free. Non-toxic if swallowed. Easy pump bottle.
usageInstructions: Apply to a soft brush, gently scrub shell, and rinse with lukewarm water.

name: UVB Light Bulb
description: A critical habitat component that provides the specific light spectrum necessary for calcium metabolism and shell strength.
ingredients: Quartz Glass, UVB Phosphors
healthBenefits: Required for Vitamin D3 synthesis. Prevents metabolic bone disease and shell soft spots.
specialFeatures: High output. Fits standard E26 sockets. 12-month effectiveness.
usageInstructions: Replace every 6-12 months even if it still glows. Position 10-12 inches away.

name: Water Heater (50W)
description: A shatterproof, submersible heater that keeps water temperatures stable to prevent lethargy and respiratory illness.
ingredients: Shatterproof Glass, Thermal Ceramic core
healthBenefits: Maintains constant metabolism and activity levels. Prevents respiratory infections.
specialFeatures: Auto shut-off. Protective plastic guard. Precise temp dial.
usageInstructions: Install horizontally near water flow. Unplug during water changes.

name: Calcium Block
description: A slow-release mineral star that conditions the water while providing an essential 'peck-able' source of calcium for beak health.
ingredients: Calcium Sulfate, Magnesium, Vitamin D3
healthBenefits: Slow-release calcium. Helps neutralize water acidity. Keeps beaks trimmed.
specialFeatures: Turtle-shaped. Slow dissolving. Fortified with vitamins.
usageInstructions: Drop into water. Replace once completely dissolved.
